title: Dark Circle screening
description: Internal R&I study to assess novel formulations targeting under-eye dark circles. We're seeking participants to evaluate efficacy on discoloration, puffiness, and fine lines, driving development of advanced eye care solutions.
instructionText:
Welcome! Please apply the product twice daily to clean, dry under-eye skin. Use our dedicated mobile app to answer daily questions and record your experiences. Consistent use is crucial; avoid other eye treatments. At the study's conclusion, please take a final selfie via the app.

If irritation occurs, stop use and contact us immediately. Thank you for your valuable contribution!

questions.text: How often do you apply the product?
How do you feel after applying the product?

label: Dark Circle screening
